text: Brian Arthur Roland Binley (1 April 1942 – December 2020) was a British Conservative Party politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Northampton South from 2005 to 2015. Binley was born in Wellingborough, Northamptonshire. Binley died in December 2020 at the age of 78.Tributes paid as former Northampton MP Brian Binley dies aged 78 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:UK MPs 2005–2010 Category:UK MPs 2010–2015 Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:People from Northamptonshire
title: Brian Binley
